verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Pallavarapu kondalapaina Prabhudasulu prarthimpaganu Aha pauluku cupina ritin | Paraloka sanghadarsanamiccen |(2){/lang-eng}

verse.name: c2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Toliprema kaligi andaramu | Baliyaina kristunu prakatinci |(2) Maranu polina sramalunna | Kananu puramuku cerudamu |(2){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Apostalula bodha sahavasamu prabhu balla Prarthana jivitamu sangha darsanamunaku mulam I atmiya langarulanu kaligi konasagedamu tuphanulalo I atmiya langarulanu kaligi i papa samudramu datedamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Visvasamu prema niriksana nilucunila Apakaramu mani dambamunu vidacedamu Sodara premalenico vyarthulamu mana mi lokamulo Sodara premalenico mrogedi talamu vale nundedamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devuni cittamunu erigi jivincedamu Prabhu cittamu koraku cellincedamu krayamu Deva ni cittamu neraverca makento santosamu Deva ni cittamu neraverca nikento santosamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devuni mandiramun premincedamellappudu Devuni vakyamunu alayamulo dhyanintumu Cirakalamu devuni mandiramulo nivasinci stutiyincedamu Cirakalamu devuni mandira tejo mahimalo vasiyincedamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Atmato satyamuto nija aradhana kaligi Yadhartha hrdayamuto manci saksyamunu kaligi Pedavula padamulu kadani mana hrdayamulanu arpincedamu Pedavula padamulu kadani hebronu prabhuni koniyadedamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ceppanasakyamunu mahima yuktamunaina Santosamu kaligi suvartanu catedamu Akasamu krinda e namamuna raksana ledani catedamu Akasamu krinda yesu namamune papaksamapana kalugunani{/lang-eng}
